00036   /**********************************************************************************************/
00044   NLOPTOptimizers::NLOPTOptimizers()
00045   {
00046     m_VerboseLevel = 0;
00047     m_Maximize = false;
00048     m_ErrorCode = NLOPT_FAILURE;
00049     m_TimeForOptimization = 0;
00050 
00051     m_StopValSet = false;
00052     m_StopVal = 0;
00053     m_FTolRel = -1;
00054     m_FTolAbs = -1;
00055     m_XTolRel = -1;
00056     m_MaxEval = -1;
00057     m_MaxTime = -1;
00058   }
00059 
00060   /**********************************************************************************************/
00068   NLOPTOptimizers::~NLOPTOptimizers()
00069   {
00070   }

00072   /**********************************************************************************************/
00089   double NLOPTOptimizers::NloptFunctionWrapper(unsigned n, const double *x, double *grad, void *data)
00090   {
00091     NLOPTOptimizers *optimizer = static_cast<NLOPTOptimizers *>(data);
00092 
00093     //-----------------------------------------
00094     // Copy the nlopt position to a itk position
00095     // (takes into account the itk scale)
00096     //-----------------------------------------
00097     NLOPTOptimizers::ParametersType itkCurrentPosition(n);
00098     for ( unsigned int i=0; i<n ; i++ )
00099       itkCurrentPosition[i] = x[i]/optimizer->GetScales()[i];
00100 
00101     double f = (optimizer->GetCostFunction()->GetValue(itkCurrentPosition));
00102 
00103     //-----------------------------------------
00104     // If needed, also compute the derivative and copy
00105     // back in *grad
00106     //-----------------------------------------
00107     if ( grad!=NULL )
00108     {
00109       DerivativeType derivative;
00110       optimizer->GetCostFunction()->GetDerivative (itkCurrentPosition, derivative);
00111       for ( unsigned int i=0; i<n ; i++ )
00112         grad[i] = derivative[i];
00113     }
00114 
00115     return f;
00116   }
00117 
00118   /**********************************************************************************************/
00128   void NLOPTOptimizers::StartOptimization()
00129   {
00130     m_TimeForOptimization = 0;
00131 
00132     if( m_CostFunction.IsNull() )
00133       throw itk::ExceptionObject(__FILE__, __LINE__, "Error. The cost function has not been set", "NLOPTOptimizers");
00134     
00135     //---------------------------------------------
00136     // n = number of parameters
00137     //---------------------------------------------
00138     unsigned int n = m_CostFunction->GetNumberOfParameters();
00139 
00140     //---------------------------------------------
00141     // x = initial position
00142     // Take into account the ITK scales
00143     //---------------------------------------------
00144     if ( this->GetInitialPosition().GetSize() != n )
00145         throw itk::ExceptionObject(__FILE__, __LINE__, "Invalid initial position parameter. Its size should be equal to the number of parameters", "NLOPTOptimizers");
00146     m_CurrentPosition.set_size(n);
00147 
00148     double *x = new double[n];
00149     const double *in_x = GetInitialPosition().data_block();
00150     for ( unsigned int i=0; i<n ; i++ )
00151     {
00152       x[i] = in_x[i] * GetScales()[i];
00153       m_CurrentPosition[i] = in_x[i];
00154     }
00155 
00156     //---------------------------------------------
00157     // lb/ub = lower bound/upper bound
00158     //---------------------------------------------
00159     double *lb=NULL;
00160     double *ub=NULL;
00161     if ( m_LowerBoundParameters.GetSize()!=0 )
00162     {
00163       if ( m_LowerBoundParameters.GetSize()!=n )
00164         throw itk::ExceptionObject(__FILE__, __LINE__, "Invalid lower bound parameter. Its size should be equal to the number of parameters", "NLOPTOptimizers");
00165       lb = m_LowerBoundParameters.data_block();
00166     }
00167     if ( m_UpperBoundParameters.GetSize()!=0 )
00168     {
00169       if ( m_UpperBoundParameters.GetSize()!=n )
00170         throw itk::ExceptionObject(__FILE__, __LINE__, "Invalid upper bound parameter. Its size should be equal to the number of parameters", "NLOPTOptimizers");
00171       ub = m_UpperBoundParameters.data_block();
00172     }
00173 
00174 
00175     //---------------------------------------------
00176     // Creates the NLOPT structure and fill it
00177     //---------------------------------------------
00178     m_NloptOptions = nlopt_create((::nlopt_algorithm)(int)m_Algorithm, n);
00179     nlopt_set_lower_bounds(m_NloptOptions, lb);
00180     nlopt_set_upper_bounds(m_NloptOptions, ub);
00181     if ( m_Maximize )
00182       nlopt_set_max_objective(m_NloptOptions, (nlopt_func)this->NloptFunctionWrapper, (void *)this);
00183     else
00184       nlopt_set_min_objective(m_NloptOptions, (nlopt_func)this->NloptFunctionWrapper, (void *)this);
00185 
00186     if ( m_StopValSet ) nlopt_set_stopval(m_NloptOptions, m_StopVal);
00187     
00188     nlopt_set_ftol_rel(m_NloptOptions, m_FTolRel);
00189     nlopt_set_ftol_abs(m_NloptOptions, m_FTolAbs);
00190     nlopt_set_xtol_rel(m_NloptOptions, m_XTolRel);
00191     nlopt_set_xtol_abs1(m_NloptOptions, m_XTolAbs);
00192     nlopt_set_maxeval(m_NloptOptions, m_MaxEval);
00193     nlopt_set_maxtime(m_NloptOptions, m_MaxTime);
00194 
00195     for ( unsigned int i=0;i<m_InequalityConstaint.size(); i++ )
00196       nlopt_add_inequality_constraint(m_NloptOptions, m_InequalityConstaint[i].fct, NULL, m_InequalityConstaint[i].tol );
00197     for ( unsigned int i=0;i<m_EqualityConstaint.size(); i++ )
00198       nlopt_add_equality_constraint(m_NloptOptions, m_EqualityConstaint[i].fct, NULL, m_EqualityConstaint[i].tol );
00199 
00200     this->InvokeEvent( StartEvent() );
00201 
00202     double start = nlopt_seconds();
00203 
00204     //----------------------------------------
00205     // Run the NLOPT optimizer !
00206     //----------------------------------------
00207     double valf;
00208     m_ErrorCode = static_cast<nlopt_result>((int)nlopt_optimize (m_NloptOptions, x, &valf));
00209     SetCurrentCost(valf);
00210 
00211     m_TimeForOptimization = nlopt_seconds() - start;
00212 
00213     //----------------------------------------
00214     // Converts back using the scales
00215     //----------------------------------------
00216     NLOPTOptimizers::ParametersType p(n);
00217     for ( unsigned int i=0; i<n ; i++ )
00218       p[i] = x[i]/GetScales()[i];
00219     this->SetCurrentPosition(p);
00220 
00221     //----------------------------------------
00222     // Free memory
00223     //----------------------------------------
00224     delete[] x;
00225     nlopt_destroy(m_NloptOptions);
00226 
00227 
00228     this->InvokeEvent( EndEvent() );
00229   }
00230 
00231   /**********************************************************************************************/
00242   bool NLOPTOptimizers::isSuccessful() const
00243   {
00244     if (m_ErrorCode < 0 
00245       && m_ErrorCode != NLOPT_ROUNDOFF_LIMITED
00246       && m_ErrorCode != NLOPT_FORCED_STOP) 
00247       return false;
00248     else
00249       return true;
00250   }
00251 
00252   /**********************************************************************************************/
00262   std::string NLOPTOptimizers::GetErrorCodeDescription() const
00263   {
00264     switch ( m_ErrorCode )
00265     {
00266     case NLOPT_SUCCESS:
00267       return "Success";
00268 
00269     case NLOPT_STOPVAL_REACHED:
00270       return "Optimization stopped because 'StopVal' was reached.";
00271     case NLOPT_FTOL_REACHED:
00272       return "Optimization stopped because 'FTolRel' or 'FTolAbs' was reached.";
00273     case NLOPT_XTOL_REACHED:
00274       return "Optimization stopped because 'XTolRel' or 'XTolAbs' was reached.";
00275     case NLOPT_MAXEVAL_REACHED:
00276       return "Optimization stopped because 'MaxEval' was reached.";
00277     case NLOPT_MAXTIME_REACHED:
00278       return "Optimization stopped because 'MaxTime' was reached.";
00279 
00280 
00281     case NLOPT_FAILURE:
00282       return "Generic failure code.";
00283     case NLOPT_INVALID_ARGS:
00284       return "Invalid arguments (e.g. lower bounds are bigger than upper bounds, an unknown algorithm was specified, etcetera).";
00285     case NLOPT_OUT_OF_MEMORY:
00286       return "Out of memory.";
00287     case NLOPT_ROUNDOFF_LIMITED:
00288       return "Halted because roundoff errors limited progress.";
00289     case NLOPT_FORCED_STOP:
00290       return "Halted because of a forced termination.";
00291 
00292     default:
00293       break;
00294     }
00295     return "Unkown error code";
00296   }
00297 
00298   /**********************************************************************************************/
00315   void NLOPTOptimizers::AddInequalityConstraint(nlopt_func fct, double tol)
00316   {
00317     ConstraintType c;
00318     c.fct=fct;
00319     c.tol=tol;
00320     m_InequalityConstaint.push_back(c);
00321   }
00322 
00323   /**********************************************************************************************/
00331   void NLOPTOptimizers::ClearInequalityConstraints()
00332   {
00333     m_InequalityConstaint.clear();
00334   }
00335 
00336   /**********************************************************************************************/
00355   void NLOPTOptimizers::AddEqualityConstraint(nlopt_func fct, double tol)
00356   {
00357     ConstraintType c;
00358     c.fct=fct;
00359     c.tol=tol;
00360     m_EqualityConstaint.push_back(c);
00361   }
00362 
00363   /**********************************************************************************************/
00371   void NLOPTOptimizers::ClearEqualityConstraints()
00372   {
00373     m_EqualityConstaint.clear();
00374   }
00375 
00379   void NLOPTOptimizers::PrintSelf(std::ostream& os, Indent indent) const
00380   {
00381     Superclass::PrintSelf(os,indent);
00382 
00383     int major, minor, bugfix;
00384     nlopt_version(&major, &minor, &bugfix);
00385     os << indent << "NLOPT v"<<major<<"."<<minor<<"."<<bugfix<<std::endl;
00386 
00387     os << indent << "Algorithm: " << ::nlopt_algorithm_name((::nlopt_algorithm)(int)m_Algorithm) << std::endl;
00388     os << indent << "Maximize On/Off   " << m_Maximize << std::endl;
00389 
00390     os << indent << "StopVal: "<<m_StopVal<<std::endl;
00391     os << indent << "FTolRel: "<<m_FTolRel<<std::endl;
00392     os << indent << "FTolAbs: "<<m_FTolAbs<<std::endl;
00393     os << indent << "XTolRel: "<<m_XTolRel<<std::endl;
00394     os << indent << "MaxEval: "<<m_MaxEval<<std::endl;
00395     os << indent << "MaxTime: "<<m_MaxTime<<std::endl;
00396 
00397 //    os << indent << "Metric Worst Possible Value " << m_MetricWorstPossibleValue << std::endl;
00398 //    os << indent << "Catch GetValue Exception " << m_CatchGetValueException   << std::endl;
00399 //    os << indent << "Space Dimension   " << m_SpaceDimension   << std::endl;
00400 //    os << indent << "Maximum Iteration " << m_MaximumIteration << std::endl;
00401 //    os << indent << "Current Iteration " << m_CurrentIteration << std::endl;
00402 //    os << indent << "Current Cost      " << m_CurrentCost      << std::endl;
00403   }
